title: Distorted View Sideshow Archive [Complete/FIXED]
description:
The complete MEMBERS-ONLY archive of the Distorted View comedy podcast... shared "just because I can".

The collection spans seven years, and includes 865 shows, 21 ringtones, 33 exclusive videocasts, and host Tim Henson&#039;s hard-to-find CD "Twisted Nipples", all for your listening/viewing pleasure.

The podcasts have been ID3 tagged for easy browsing on your favorite MP3 player.

IF YOU ENJOY THIS, SIGN UP FOR A MEMBERSHIP AT SIDESHOWFREAKS.COM ! Or, if you&#039;re a cheap bitch, sign up for the free side of the podcast (minus this entire archive, minus extended and exclusive shows, minus new videocasts): http://www.distortedview.com/show/atom.xml

About the show:

Distorted View Daily is a comedy podcast featuring bizarre stories in the news, comedy sketches, and adult humor.

Every weekday host Tim Henson scours the web for bizarre stories in the news and reports them back to you with his unique commentary. You&#039;ll also hear bizarre erotica, definitions of twisted sex acts, comedy sketches, and other audiophonic oddities.
